meanings.definition: Plant compounds that are structurally similar to cholesterol.
meanings.sent1: Phytosterols are natural substances found in plants.
meanings.sent2: Many people consume phytosterols for their health benefits.
meanings.sent3: The doctor explained how phytosterols can be like plant superheroes.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of health, phytosterols stand tall like mighty trees.
meanings.sent5: The role of phytosterols in plants is crucial for their growth and development.

meanings.definition: Found in fruits, vegetables, nuts, and seeds.
meanings.sent1: Include phytosterols-rich foods in your diet for better health.
meanings.sent2: A salad with phytosterols-packed ingredients is nutritious.
meanings.sent3: The nutty character of phytosterols adds flavor to dishes.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a colorful mix of phytosterols-filled produce.
meanings.sent5: The market offers a variety of phytosterols-containing options for shoppers.

meanings.definition: May help lower cholesterol levels in the body.
meanings.sent1: Eating phytosterols regularly can reduce cholesterol.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommend phytosterols to patients with high cholesterol.
meanings.sent3: The race to lower cholesterol was won by phytosterols.
meanings.sent4: Phytosterols work silently to battle high cholesterol levels.
meanings.sent5: In the fight against cholesterol, phytosterols are powerful allies.
